background: Enterprise-grade secure AWS infrastructure with comprehensive security controls including KMS encryption, VPC isolation, CloudTrail auditing, AWS Config compliance monitoring, WAF protection, and multi-AZ high availability. Implements defense-in-depth security with encrypted storage, least privilege IAM, CloudFront CDN, and complete infrastructure as code using single-file Terraform configuration.
aws_services: S3 Bucket, VPC, IAM, CloudWatch, RDS, ALB, CloudFront, Lambda, CloudTrail, EC2
author: koushik-turing
